message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to me and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. I understand its value to you might be around $8,000, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making an offer. Looking forward to your response.
